name: Signal & Tease
description: Kinky-tease cards using code words, emoji games, reactions, and clever role-play scenarios. Strongly spicy and daring, but PG-17 compliant. Remote-first design.

prompts.text: Create a secret code word between you two that means 'I want you right now.' Use it in a text and show their reaction.
What's the boldest thing you've ever wanted to ask your partner to do?
Send your partner a series of increasingly suggestive emojis that tell a story.
Have you ever tried to seduce your partner in public without being too obvious?
Create a role-play scenario text exchange: you're a mysterious stranger and your partner doesn't know it's you.
What position or scenario would you be too embarrassed to suggest out loud?
Send a voice message in a sultry voice describing exactly what you're imagining right now.
If you could choreograph a seduction scene with your partner, what would it look like?
Play a game: you send a suggestive photo, your partner responds with one emoji that judges your level of boldness.
What's the dirtiest thing your partner has whispered to you or asked you to do?
Send a voice message as if you're narrating a romantic/spicy scene starring you both.
Describe your partner's most seductive quality in three provocative sentences.
Create a text-based game: you type one word at a time, building a spicy story together.
What's your biggest fantasy that you've never fully articulated to your partner?
Send your partner a 'choose your adventure' text: Option A, B, or Câ€”what would you prefer right now?
If there were no judgment, what would you ask your partner to do?
Describe your partner's reaction to something scandalous in a slow-motion, dramatic voice message.
What's your secret weapon for getting your partner to say yes?
Send a photo of something you're holding (innocently) with a completely suggestive caption.
Describe what your partner was wearing the last time you felt completely turned on by them.
Create a coded message using only reaction emojis that describes what you want to do with your partner.
If you could relive any intimate moment exactly as it was, which would it be?
Send a voice message in different accents/characters describing why you're attracted to your partner.
What's the most spontaneous, risky thing you'd like to do with your partner?
Play emoji roulette: randomize emoji reactions to spicy scenarios and respond with only emojis.
